title: connection timed out, wait que time
body: Sometimes, actually like 4 out of 10 times my connection times out despite having good internet connection during que time. As a result, que doesn't pop up and I get penalized with a que wait time for something I can't control. Why does this happen and what can I do to prevent this?

replies.body: It seems that despite a good connection overall, there are hiccups when specifically connected to the game server that's causing you to drop out.  I suggest going through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this as well as any settings that may be blocking a strong connection to the server.  You can also use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) for some automatic steps including firewall settings.  Hope that helps!
